description:
Sansho is one of Garlic Jr.`s henchmen. He appears to be more confident than either Ginger or Nicky, fighting someone one-on-one at Garlic Jr.`s castle rather than going two-on-one, and he doesn`t seem to make swords like his comrades can.
By shouting "Pepperoni" or "Cheese" or "Unaju" (depending on the language and dub) he gets muscular, and his power and speed increase.
name: Sansho
